home.from: From deciding to embark on the Hajj pilgrimage to completing your profound journey

journey.regInfo: This step ensures that all necessary information is accurately collected and securely stored, facilitating the smooth coordination of pilgrimage logistics. With intuitive guidance and clear instructions, the Registration step simplifies the process for pilgrims, allowing them to embark on their spiritual journey with ease and peace of mind.

journey.accominfo: In this step, pilgrims are presented with a comprehensive list of available hotels, ranging from budget-friendly options to luxury accommodations, conveniently ...
journey.payinfo: In this step, pilgrims are provided with a secure and user-friendly platform to settle their bills and fees associated with the pilgrimage, including registration fees ...
journey.stepinfo: In this step, pilgrims gain access to a curated series of resources, tools, and information to navigate each stage of the Hajj pilgrimage with confidence and ease. From the ...
